title: At Kherson direction Russian army shelled Tyahynka, Ivanivka, Mykilske of Kherson region and Kherson city, - General Staff of...
content: At Kherson direction Russian army shelled Tyahynka, Ivanivka, Mykilske of Kherson region and Kherson city, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
